content:
Q: What is the time frame for submitting a travel claim when I return to Singapore?
A: You will need to submit a claim within thirty (30) days upon returning to Singapore.
questions: How long do I have to submit a travel claim after returning to Singapore?
What is the deadline for filing a travel claim upon returning to Singapore?
Within how many days must I submit my travel claim after I come back to Singapore?

Can you tell me the time limit for submitting a travel claim once I return to Singapore?
What happens if I don't submit my travel claim within 30 days of returning to Singapore?
Is there a specific time frame to submit a travel claim after my trip to Singapore?
How many days after returning to Singapore do I have to file a travel claim?
